section.20: The Book on Vows and Oaths

hadiths.text: Narrated Salim:From his father (Ibn 'Umar) that the Prophet (ï·º) heard 'Umar saying: "By my father, By my father!" So he said: "Verily Allah prohibits you from swearing by your father." So 'Umar said: "By Allah I did not swear by him after that, neither intentionally nor in narrating
